transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Uh, hi Ashish sir, Pallavi baat kar rahi thi main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Sir main Abhishek ke manager baat kar rahi thi. Aapse kabhi baat nahi ho paayi hai aaj tak services ko lekar. Abhishek bhi bata rahe the ki aapke
Customer: Actually abhi uh hospital ke isme hu ma'am. Main karta hu call.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir. Aap na time de dijiye. Mujhe yeh bata dijiye main
summary:
Concerns:
- Executive wanted to discuss services.
- Customer was unavailable due to a hospital emergency.

Resolution:
- Customer informed he was at a hospital and would call back.

Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Customer stated he will call back.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Urgent

@@@Key Topics:
- service discussion, callback request, customer unavailability
